question: Which Atlanta Braves player was the first to win the National League MVP award in 1991, leading the team to its first division title since relocating to Atlanta?
answer: Terry Pendleton won the National League MVP award in 1991, helping the Braves secure their first division title in Atlanta.
raw_content:
Question: Which Atlanta Braves player was the first to win the National League MVP award in 1991, leading the team to its first division title since relocating to Atlanta?  
Answer: Terry Pendleton won the National League MVP award in 1991, helping the Braves secure their first division title in Atlanta.
